channel.title: Dash on CoderDojo Schöneweide
channel.description: Recent content in Dash on CoderDojo Schöneweide

item.title: FEZ Phenomena Workshop
item.description: It’s the fall vacations in Berlin and the FEZ Berlin invited children and their families to marvel, explore and play. play. The fall vacations were not supposed to be boring. We from CoderDojo Schöneweide were also there with 2 voluntary organized workshops on site. Our energetic mentors played and programmed together with the children small, lively Dash robots that could be operated with a tablet. There were a total of 5 different challenges to overcome at both workshops.
